title: True Crime Streets Of LA PS2
description:
True Crime Streets of LA


Experience the hard-boiled life of a Los Angeles city cop, and 
choose to either uphold the law or take it into your own hands. 
True Crime: Streets of LA puts players in the role of LA cop Nick 
Kang on missions to take down major crime syndicates. True Crime 
recreates a 400 mile area of bustling Los Angeles California 
cityscape, where players will be able to freely roam, or take on 
missions that span from trendy Santa Monica to the gritty streets 
of Hollywood. True Crime also features deep "bullet-time" 
shootouts, and martial arts battles.


Release date: November 4, 2003 
Platform: PlayStation 2

*This has been patched with ESR to work with Free McBoot.

*Has also been tested with PCSX2 and has severe lag issues with
 this emulator so you will have to use the Free McBoot method or
 you must have a hard modded PlayStation 2.
